job_history.work_description: Handled large call volume while being able to multi task and provide accurate information to the consumers while maintaining a high level of quality of service. Keep records of customer interactions or transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, or comments, as well as actions taken. Confer with customers by telephone or in person to provide information about products or services, take or enter orders, cancel accounts, or obtain details of complaints. Refer unresolved customer grievances to designated departments for further investigation. Complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, or issue service discontinuance orders, using computers.

Provides supervision and leadership to a team of 20 to 60 customer service representatives and through the various communication channels within operations (telephone, e- mail, written correspondence, and web-chat). Met contract specific goals/objectives as required. Extensive experience with the Healthcare Marketplace. Supervise, develop, and coach CSRs to assure productivity, quality, attendance, and timeliness of work in the completion of assigned projects and departmental goals. Maintain daily reports regarding adherence, service level, and staffed hours to assure CSR's and team are meeting contract and department goals. Assume leadership responsibility for floor management (including agent placement), department tasks, and contact center incentives. Work closely as a team with CSR's, other supervisors, customer service managers, and senior site managers within operational areas of the contact center. Complete and deliver employee performance appraisals on a monthly and yearly basis and corrective actions as needed. Interviewed and hired qualified candidates for CCO customer service representative as well as performed substantial portion of recruitment for new hire employees (including advertising and job fairs).

Handled large call volume while being able to multi task and provide accurate information to the consumers while maintaining a high level of quality of service. Keep records of customer interactions or transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, or comments, as well as actions taken. Confer with customers by telephone or in person to provide information about products or services, take or enter orders, cancel accounts, or obtain details of complaints. Refer unresolved customer grievances to designated departments for further investigation. Complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, or issue service discontinuance orders, using computers.

Handled 100 calls a day while being able to multi task and provide accurate information to the consumers while maintaining a high level of quality of service. Keep records of customer interactions or transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, or comments, as well as actions taken. Confer with customers by telephone or in person to provide information about products or services, take or enter orders, cancel accounts, or obtain details of complaints. Practiced Conflict Resolution, refer unresolved customer grievances to designated departments for further investigation. Complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, or issue service discontinuance orders, using computers.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in customer service, handling large call volumes, and providing accurate information to consumers while maintaining a high level of quality of service, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Supervised a team of 20 to 60 customer service representatives, met contract specific goals, and developed coaching skills, showing strong proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively communicated with customers through various channels, including telephone, email, written correspondence, and web-chat, demonstrating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Handled large call volumes while multitasking and maintaining a high level of quality of service, indicating strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Conflict Resolution
skills.explanation: Practiced conflict resolution by referring unresolved customer grievances to designated departments for further investigation, showing solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Supervised and developed a team of customer service representatives, demonstrating solid working proficiency in team management.

skills.name: Computer Literacy
skills.explanation: Used computers to complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, or issue service discontinuance orders, showing solid working proficiency in computer literacy.
